Worst Case Scenario 

13672 x 0.3 = 4101.6
4101.6 - 1230.48 = 2871.12

YR1
3486 x 0.3 = 1045.806
1045.806 x 0.3 = 313.74
1045.806 - 313.74 = 732.06

1045.80 - 732.06 
9486.02 - 1992.06 = 7493.96

Gross yr 2 = revenue + net income
173,533.5 + 7493.96 =1811026
